entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 5:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: WNW 21 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late in the evening. A few showers beginning overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
